description: This file defines a Java interface for the Note repository, extending JpaRepository to enable CRUD operations and custom querying for Note entities based on user ID with ordering by update time.

classes.name: NoteRepository
classes.description: A Spring Data JPA repository interface for Note entities, providing built-in CRUD operations and a custom query method to retrieve notes by user ID ordered by update time descending.

methods.name: findByUserIdOrderByUpdatedAtDesc
methods.description: Custom query method to retrieve a list of Note objects associated with a specific user, ordered by the most recently updated.
